entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries changing to snow in the evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
